probe "you know how use your month"

added darkfate and the comlink ended

"i've told you that you muzzzt be ready to take care the bat"screamed 
wespa.

"I'm not a baby-siter to do it wich" replied rudely mantys"any it was 
your affair too"

and they continued arged
